ceterms:description: As one of the lowest priced private universities in the state, USF represents a tremendous value and is a wonderful investment in your future.  Most students, even those who may not have financial need, receive scholarships at the University of Saint Francis. In addition, funds from state and federal grants, private scholarships, loans and work-study may be available for you.

ceterms:estimatedCost.ceterms:description: The University of Saint Francis is committed to making education as affordable as possible. The only application USF requires to determine financial aid eligibility is the FAFSA (Free Application for Federal Student Aid). The FAFSA is available every year after October 1 and should be completed prior to April 15 prior to the start of an academic year to ensure students receive the maximum amount of aid for which they are eligible. Prior to being able to apply for financial aid, we want to afford students the opportunity to determine an estimate of their financial aid eligibility prior to the FAFSA being made available. Please complete the appropriate Net Price Calculator to see how affordable USF can be.
ceterms:estimatedCost.ceterms:name: Net Price Calculator

ceterms:name: Tuition and Fees (Undergraduate)

ceterms:description: Elon University is committed to providing an exceptional education at a reasonable cost.

ceterms:estimatedCost.ceterms:description: For federal financial aid purposes, indirect costs including books, transportation, and miscellaneous expenses (set at $3,500) are added to tuition, fees, room, and board to determine Elon Universityâ€™s official total cost of attendance, which is $49,642 for 2017-2018.
ceterms:estimatedCost.ceterms:name: Cost

ceterms:name: Elon University Tuition and Fees

ceterms:description:
EMP certification is available to industry professionals who are responsible for managing and continually improving energy performance in commercial buildings. The scope of the EMP program is aligned with the Energy Management Professional consensus qualifications guidelines established by the U.S. Department of Energy.

EMP certificants:

Plan effective energy management

Manage energy information

Implement energy management programs

Manage budgets and finances

Implement energy efficient projects

Manage energy communications

ceterms:estimatedCost.ceterms:description: Individuals employed by an EMA member company, or by a company that has submitted a completed application EMP Application & Exam Fee $500. All other individuals, $750.
ceterms:estimatedCost.ceterms:name: EMA Employee

ceterms:name: Certification Fees

ceterms:description: All amounts shown in the Tuition and Fees Schedules or in other university publications or Web pages represent tuition and fees as currently approved. However, Arizona State University reserves the right to increase or modify tuition and fees without prior notice, upon approval by the Arizona Board of Regents or as otherwise consistent with board policy, and to make such modifications applicable to students enrolled at ASU at that time as well as to incoming students. In addition, all tuition amounts and fees are subject to change at any time for correction of errors. Finally, please note that fee amounts billed for any period may be adjusted at a future date.

ceterms:description:
Weâ€™re making it affordable for you to complete your degree. We want you to have access to the high-quality education the University of Saint Francis is known for, but at a price you can afford. Our online adult and graduate programs are offered at lower-than-average tuition rates and financial aid is available for qualifying students.

Outside scholarships, employer reimbursement and government funding may be available. Because you will receive a reduced tuition rate when you earn your degree through the USF Virtual Campus, you will be ineligible for scholarships or discounts from the USF, including the Alumni Second Degree Grant and Franciscan Alliance.
ceterms:name: Tuition and Fees (Online Programs)

ceterms:description: The Certified Nurse Aide (CNA) Course at USF Crown Point will prepare you to begin your career as a health care professional. In just eight weeks, youâ€™ll complete the classroom and clinical hours necessary to be eligible for certification by the Indiana State Department of Health. That means youâ€™ll soon be able to begin caring for patients under the supervision of a registered nurse or licensed practical nurse
ceterms:name: Course Fee (CNA Crown Point)

ceterms:description:
The Doctor of Nursing Practice (DNP) is a practice-oriented doctor that prepares graduates with the knowledge and skills to translate research into practice and improve patient outcomes across populations. In addition, the BSN-DNP Nurse Anesthesia Program is designed to prepare the next generation of nurse anesthetists with the essential skills to serve society as compassionate clinicians, leaders, and educators.

A CRNA is an advanced practice registered nurse that has received at least a Masterâ€™s degree related to the practice of nurse anesthesia. According to the American Association of Nurse Anesthetists, CRNAs safely deliver approximately 40 million anesthetics in the U.S. each year for patients undergoing surgical and obstetrical procedures, pain management, and trauma services. CRNAs are often the sole anesthesia provider in rural hospitals and the main provider of anesthesia for the U.S. Armed Forces. CRNAâ€™s administer anesthesia in a variety of settings including hospitals (urban and rural), outpatient ambulatory centers, physician offices, military installations, and pain management clinics.
ceterms:name: Tuition and Fees (CRNA-DNP)

ceterms:description:
Getting a masterâ€™s or doctoral degree is worth the investment and the Graduate School at the University of Saint Francis offers several ways to make it affordable. From student loans and graduate assistantships to need-based scholarships and alumni tuition discounts, the Graduate School and the Office of Financial Aid can help make it possible for you to take the next step in your career. Thatâ€™s our commitment to you.

Tuition for our graduate programs can vary by program.  Please check our website to get the most current information on our outstanding degree programs!
ceterms:name: Tuition and Fees (Graduate Programs)
